name: 簡永彬
objective:
本課程主要以傳統黑白底片創作主的影像處理訓練,透過傳統暗房的操作，培養學生對影像品質的概念，並訓練學生對事物的觀察及敏感度，進一步創作完整一系列黑白影像作品,培養學生能創作自己的影像風格目的。 
This course mainly focuses on image processing training in the creation of traditional black and white negatives. Through the operation of traditional darkrooms, students are cultivated in the concept of image quality, and students are trained in observation and sensitivity of things, and further create a complete series of black and white image works. Students can create their own image style for the purpose.
